Hero.title: <highlight>You shoot</highlight>, we handle the rest.
Hero.description: You shoot, upload, and share a QR code. Every guest finds their own photos using AI face search.

Metadata.title: FrameFast - Event Photo Distribution
Metadata.description: AI-powered face recognition photo distribution platform for photographers and event organizers.

FeatureStory.title: One platform. Your entire workflow.
FeatureStory.subtitle: Face search that finds every guest, LINE delivery they already trust, and tools that match your style.

faceSearch.label: Face search
faceSearch.title: Guests find themselves in seconds.
faceSearch.description: Upload your photos. Guests scan a QR, take a selfie, and AI returns their matches instantly.

features.privacy: Guests only see their own photos

lineDelivery.label: LINE delivery
lineDelivery.title: Photos delivered straight to LINE.
lineDelivery.description: Guests send a selfie in LINE and receive their matched photos instantly, no app to download, no website to visit.

colorGrading.label: Auto color grading
colorGrading.title: Your signature look, on every photo.
colorGrading.description: Upload a LUT once. Every photo gets your color grade automatically, no manual editing, consistent results.

features.upload: Upload your own LUT or generate from a reference image

dashboard.label: Organizer UI
dashboard.title: One platform for your entire event workflow.
dashboard.description: Create events, upload photos, and track credits. Less time on logistics, more time behind the camera.

IosApp.label: iOS app
IosApp.title: Capture, sync, and deliver from your pocket.
IosApp.description: Import from camera, monitor upload status, and keep event delivery moving while you are still on-site.

Faq.title: Frequently asked questions
Faq.subtitle: Privacy, attendee flow, and credit-based delivery.

accuracy.question: How accurate is face search?
accuracy.answer: FrameFast is tuned for real event conditions and typically returns strong matches fast. Guests confirm with one selfie and see their photos in seconds.

privacy.question: Is attendee privacy protected?
privacy.answer: Yes. Guests only see photos matched to their own selfie. You control album visibility and event access.

formats.question: What formats are supported, and how long are photos retained?
formats.answer: We support JPEG, PNG, and WebP uploads up to 10 MB per image. Event photo access is set to a 30-day window by default (about 1 month).

credits.question: Do free credits expire?
credits.answer: Yes. Your 1,000 free credits are valid for 1 month. After that, you can continue with paid top-ups at transparent tier pricing.

upload.question: Which upload methods are supported?
upload.answer: Upload via iOS app, web uploader, or desktop uploader, then deliver through QR and LINE links.

sales.question: Can I talk to sales for high-volume events?
sales.answer: Yes. Email {email} for volume pricing and support.

Footer.brandDescription: Event photo distribution with AI-powered face recognition. Made for photographers and event organizers.

Pricing.title: Sign up free. Get <credits>1,000 credits</credits> for real event workloads.
Pricing.subtitle: <highlight>Pay as you go</highlight> after your free credits are used.
Pricing.salesCta: Need high-volume event pricing? Contact sales

UploadWay.title: Upload your way
UploadWay.subtitle: Pick the ingest path that fits the job, all feeding one delivery workflow.

ios.title: iOS app
ios.description: Connect to your camera wirelessly, shoot as usual, and keep uploads syncing in the background.

web.title: Web upload
web.description: Drag, drop, and batch upload from any modern browser.

desktop.title: Desktop uploader
desktop.description: Stable large-batch transfer from your workstation.
